product.product_title: Skechers Go Run Consistent - 220102, Women's Fashion Sneakers, White/Silver, 8.5
product.cushioning: Responsive ULTRA LIGHT cushioning and an Air-Cooled Goga Mat insole for superior comfort.
product.breathability: Breathable mesh upper, as mentioned in product details.
product.short_description: Experience a new level of walking and running comfort with the Skechers Go Run Consistent - 220102, Women's Fashion Sneakers. Designed for the active woman, these sneakers in a crisp White/Silver colorway, size 8.5, combine sporty style with Skechers' most advanced comfort technologies. The shoe features a responsive ULTRA LIGHT midsole cushioning that provides a soft, supportive, and incredibly lightweight feel with every step. Inside, the Air-Cooled Goga Mat insole offers high-rebound cushioning and cooling comfort, keeping your feet feeling fresh and energized all day long. The engineered mesh upper is not only stylish but also highly breathable, ensuring optimal airflow to prevent overheating. Finished with a durable outsole for reliable traction, the Skechers Go Run Consistent is the perfect everyday sneaker for walking, light jogging, or simply staying active in total comfort. Step into a pair and discover why Skechers is a leader in innovative comfort footwear.
product.about_this_item: ULTRA LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN: Experience exceptional comfort with these womens shoes featuring responsive ULTRA LIGHT cushioning and breathable mesh upper, weighing only 6.4 oz. ADVANCED CUSHIONING TECHNOLOGY: Air-Cooled Goga Mat insole provides high-rebound cushioning while M-Strike technology ensures smooth transitions from landing to toe-off. SUPERIOR STABILITY: Parametric midsole construction delivers enhanced support and stability for these shoes for women during your workout routine. EASY MAINTENANCE: Machine washable design keeps your women shoes looking fresh with minimal effort. VERSATILE PERFORMANCE: Perfect for running, training, and everyday wear with durable leather and mesh construction.
